Merciless Nature

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Wilden, assassin, wrath of the destroyer power
Benefit: If the enemy triggering your wrath of the destroyer power is subject to one or more of your shrouds, you gain combat advantage for the melee basic attack or charge attack.

Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 35.
